mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer( customer_no, customer_id, customer_pw, customer_name, customer_birth, customer_gender, customer_email, customer_phone, customer_type ) VALUES ( #{customerNo}, #{customerId}, #{customerPw}, #{customerName}, #{customerBirth}, #{customerGender}, #{customerEmail}, #{customerPhone}, #{customerType} )
mapper.select: SELECT customer_no as customerNo, customer_id as customerId, customer_name as customerName, customer_type as customerType FROM customer where customer_id = #{customerId} AND customer_pw = #{customerPw}

SELECT customer_no as customerNo, customer_id as customerId, customer_pw as customerPw, customer_name as customerName, customer_birth as customerBirth, customer_gender as customerGender, customer_email as customerEmail, customer_phone as customerPhone, customer_type as customerType FROM customer where customer_no = #{String}
